name: Innovation Flowchart | –°—Ö–µ–º–∞ –∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–∞
description:
The innovation process diagram is a detailed description of the different stages of the innovation process, indicating the activities, requirements and objectives of each step. The description identifies the various skills, activities, and funding that may be required to successfully implement a project or launch an organization. The structured process description, which is part of this tool, provides an insight into where you are in the process and also helps to make the next steps in your work.


This tool identifies opportunities for growth and identifies resources to focus on. This becomes clear once you determine your current position in the innovation process and see if you have taken into account all possible aspects.
